title: Client crash when its turn to pick in ranked
body:
Since the new patch recently my client crashes only in ranked champion slect once a day.....

in the last 12 hours it has crashed 3 times in ranked q's causing me to lose 19lp and have a 30m q timer....like riot please....whatever you have changed this last patch is causing me to crash when its my turn to pick.....if i do get lucky enough to pick i have to guess how long i have to wait till i can close the client reopen it to be in game.....

replies.body: Are you sure that it's League, and not some other problem that occurred on your computer at coincidentally the same time?
no its been happening since the previous patch. never happened before and its random. didnt happen since the last patch has hit live servers

Alright, tell me your OS and ISP.

Have you tried changing DNS yet?
windows 8.1 and telstra. no havent tried but havent had problems with the client till 6.1 and now after the patch too it crashes lost promos to d5 because of it
